DOC.brief_title: Drug-drug Interaction Study With ASP1941 Glimepiride

DOC.criteria: BMI 18.5 30 kg/m2 , inclusive Any liver function test upper limit normal Pulse < 40 > 90 bpm ; Systolic Blood Pressure > 140 mmHg ; Diastolic Blood Pressure > 90 mmHg
